metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network: eddy covariance system of desert station, 2022
metadata.titleCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网：荒漠站涡动相关仪（2022）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the desert station eddy covariance system (EC) in the downstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2022. The site (100.9872° E, 42.1135° N) was located in the Ejina Banner in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region. The elevation is 1054 m. The EC was installed at a height of 4.7 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the type of eddy covariance was closed-path (CPEC200).
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 10% of the 30 min raw record. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. Suspicious data were marked in red. 
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2022年1月1日至2022年12月31日的黑河流域地表过程综合观测网下游荒漠站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于内蒙古额济纳旗，下垫面是荒漠。观测点的经纬度是100.9872E, 42.1135N，海拔1054m。涡动相关仪的架高4.7m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪为闭路涡动相关仪（CPEC200）。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区大约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是其经济发展的基础，尤其是在中国西部，自古以来就是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持着中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域已被前期研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，并支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展是非常重要的。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（Zhao et al., 2013）、咸海流域（Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone, 2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据集，包括2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度、风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are data collection methods for surface process observations in arid regions more reliant on eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, or automatic weather stations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区的表面过程观察中，数据收集方法更依赖于涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪还是自动气象站？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Are the main challenges in maintaining ecological stability in inland river basins more related to natural vegetation degradation, dust storms, or river and lake drying?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 维持内陆河流流域生态稳定的主要挑战是与自然植被退化、沙尘暴还是河流和湖泊干涸有关？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What data processing techniques are employed to ensure the quality of flux data collected in arid and semiarid regions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区收集的通量数据中，采用了哪些数据处理技术以确保数据质量？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where are the observational datasets from oasis-desert systems primarily collected in western China?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 西中国的绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集主要收集在哪里？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with data collection in inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，内陆河流流域的数据收集面临哪些挑战？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to monitor energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于监测干旱地区能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to monitor energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions is the use of an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. These instruments provide half-hourly turbulent flux data. Additionally, hydrometeorological data such as radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles are collected using automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于监测干旱地区能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集方法的一个例子是使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪。这些仪器提供半小时的湍流通量数据。此外，自动气象站还收集辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面等水文气象数据，平均周期为10分钟。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a dataset that includes observations of oasis-desert systems for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange?
Example.QuestionCn: 一个包含绿洲-沙漠系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换观测的示例数据集是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset that includes observations of oasis-desert systems for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange is the dataset available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center. This dataset comprises data from 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations in the middle and lower reaches of the Heihe River Basin, collected from 2012 to 2021.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个包含绿洲-沙漠系统能量、水汽和碳交换观测的示例数据集是国家西藏高原数据中心提供的数据集。该数据集包括2012年至2021年间在黑河流域中下游的11个陆面通量和气象站收集的数据。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you give an example of challenges faced in maintaining ecological stability in arid regions, particularly those involving inland river basins?
Example.QuestionCn: 在维持干旱地区生态稳定性方面，特别是涉及内陆河流流域时，面临的挑战的一个例子是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of challenges faced in maintaining ecological stability in arid regions involves the ecological environment degradation in inland river basins, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms. These challenges are especially prevalent in areas like the Tarim River basin, the Aral Sea basin, and the Lake Urmia basin.
Example.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区维持生态稳定面临的挑战之一是内陆河流流域的生态环境退化，例如河流和湖泊的干涸、自然植被的退化、土地沙漠化的加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴。这些挑战在塔里木河流域、阿拉尔海流域和乌尔米湖流域等地区尤为突出。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific data processing steps involved in handling eddy covariance system measurements for energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in arid and semiarid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 处理干旱和半干旱地区的涡度协方差系统测量能量、水蒸气和碳通量的具体数据处理步骤包括：
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: wild point value elimination, time lag correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, density (WPL) correction, quality evaluation for flux values, checks for atmospheric stability, turbulent similarity characteristics
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 野点值消除、时间滞后校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正、超声波虚拟温度校正、密度（WPL）校正、通量值质量评估、大气稳定性检查、湍流相似性特征。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the challenges associated with maintaining a reliable data collection network in oasis–desert systems, particularly with respect to ecological degradation and climate factors?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，维护可靠的数据收集网络面临的挑战主要与生态退化和气候因素有关。
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: ecological environment degradation, river and lake drying, natural vegetation degradation, land desertification, dust storms
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 生态环境退化，河流和湖泊干涸，天然植被退化，土地荒漠化，沙尘暴。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics and types of auxiliary data that can complement energy, water vapor, and carbon flux observations in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，可以补充能量、水蒸气和碳通量观测的辅助数据的特征和类型有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: hydrometeorological data, groundwater table data, vegetation and soil parameters
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 水文气象数据、地下水位数据、植被和土壤参数

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many ordinary meteorological stations are included in the observational network established since 2012 in the oasis–desert areas?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自2012年以来，在绿洲-沙漠地区建立的观测网络中包含多少个普通气象站？

Quantification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，从自动气象站收集的水文气象数据的平均周期是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is an eddy covariance system in the context of data collection for oasis–desert systems?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统的数据收集背景下，涡度协方差系统是一种用于测量和分析气体交换（如水蒸气和二氧化碳）与地表之间相互作用的技术。
Definition.AnswerEn: An eddy covariance system is a technique used for measuring and analyzing turbulent fluxes of energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane in the atmosphere. It involves the use of instruments that can capture high-frequency data on wind speed, temperature, and gas concentrations, which are then processed to obtain half-hourly turbulent flux data, as utilized in oasis–desert systems.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统是一种用于测量和分析大气中能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷的湍流通量的技术。它涉及使用能够捕获风速、温度和气体浓度的高频数据的仪器，这些数据随后被处理以获得半小时的湍流通量数据，应用于绿洲-沙漠系统。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'quality control procedure' in the context of data collection for oasis–desert ecosystems?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在沙漠生态系统的数据收集过程中，“质量控制程序”是指确保收集的数据准确、可靠和一致的一系列步骤和措施。
Definition.AnswerEn: Quality control procedure refers to the systematic process involved in ensuring the accuracy and reliability of collected data. In the context of oasis–desert ecosystems, it involves steps such as data collection, processing, archiving, and sharing, ensuring that the datasets are accurate and meet the required standards for use in research and analysis.
Definition.AnswerCn: 质量控制程序是指确保收集数据的准确性和可靠性的系统过程。在绿洲-沙漠生态系统的背景下，它涉及数据收集、处理、归档和共享等步骤，确保数据集的准确性并符合研究和分析所需的标准。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of Eddypro software processing techniques influence the quality and accuracy of observed data in arid and semiarid regions?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: Eddypro软件处理技术的集成如何影响干旱和半干旱地区观测数据的质量和准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Eddypro software processing techniques influence the quality and accuracy of observed data by applying steps like outlier removal, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, sonic temperature correction, and density correction. These steps ensure data reliability, especially for measuring energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges, critical for understanding ecological interactions in arid and semiarid regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: Eddypro软件处理技术通过应用如异常值去除、时间延迟校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正、声学温度校正和密度校正等步骤，影响观测数据的质量和准确性。这些步骤确保数据的可靠性，特别是在测量能量、水蒸气和碳交换方面，这对理解干旱和半干旱地区的生态相互作用至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges faced in maintaining a balance between oasis and desert systems, and how might these challenges impact data collection techniques?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在维持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡时，可能面临的挑战有哪些，这些挑战又可能如何影响数据收集技术？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Potential challenges include the degradation of ecological environments, such as drying rivers and intensifying desertification, which could affect data collection techniques by introducing variability in environmental conditions. These challenges necessitate robust long-term observation systems and careful data processing to maintain data integrity and support sustainable oasis development.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 潜在的挑战包括生态环境的退化，例如河流干涸和沙漠化加剧，这可能会通过引入环境条件的变异性来影响数据收集技术。这些挑战需要强有力的长期观测系统和仔细的数据处理，以维护数据的完整性并支持可持续的绿洲发展。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: In what ways can long-term observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges contribute to sustainable development strategies in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 长期观察能量、水蒸气和碳交换的方式如何有助于绿洲-沙漠生态系统的可持续发展战略？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Long-term observations provide a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange dynamics, essential for recognizing oasis–desert interactions. This understanding supports ecological stability and socioeconomic development by informing policies and strategies aimed at achieving carbon neutrality and maintaining ecological security in these ecosystems.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 长期观察提供了对能量、水汽和碳交换动态的定量理解，这对于认识绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要。这种理解通过为实现碳中和和维护这些生态系统的生态安全提供政策和战略支持，从而促进生态稳定和社会经济发展。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes challenges in maintaining the ecological balance between oasis and desert systems during data collection in arid and semiarid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区进行数据收集时，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间生态平衡的挑战是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges in maintaining the ecological balance between oasis and desert systems during data collection in arid and semiarid regions arise from the degradation of the ecological environment, such as drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, intensification of land desertification, and frequent dust storms, particularly in inland river basins along the Silk Road.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区进行数据收集时，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间生态平衡的挑战源于生态环境的退化，例如河流和湖泊的干涸、自然植被的退化、土地沙漠化的加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴，特别是在丝绸之路沿线的内陆河流流域。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it critical to implement long-term observational data collection techniques in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中实施长期观察数据收集技术是至关重要的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Long-term observational data collection techniques in oasis–desert ecosystems are critical to achieving a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, which supports ecological security, sustainable development, and helps achieve goals such as carbon peaking and carbon neutrality.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，长期观测数据收集技术对于实现能量、水蒸气和碳交换的定量理解至关重要，这支持生态安全、可持续发展，并有助于实现碳达峰和碳中和等目标。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences for data quality when using a combination of different data processing techniques such as Eddypro software in data collection methods?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用不同数据处理技术（如Eddypro软件）进行数据收集方法时，数据质量可能面临的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using a combination of data processing techniques like Eddypro software can enhance data quality by providing steps like wild point removal, delay time correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and several other adjustments. These steps help ensure accuracy by correcting for potential errors and biases in raw data, thus improving the reliability of the observed flux values.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用像Eddypro软件这样的数据处理技术组合可以通过执行野点去除、延迟时间校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正以及其他几种调整步骤来提高数据质量。这些步骤有助于通过纠正原始数据中的潜在错误和偏差来确保准确性，从而提高观测通量值的可靠性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the inclusion of various auxiliary data such as hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters affect the interpretation of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 各种辅助数据的纳入，如水文气象、植被和土壤参数，可能会如何影响对能量、水汽和碳交换观测结果的解读？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The inclusion of auxiliary data such as hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters can provide a more comprehensive context for interpreting energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations. These additional datasets help in understanding the interactions between different environmental variables and can lead to more accurate insights into ecosystem processes and their responses to environmental changes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 辅助数据的纳入，如水文气象、植被和土壤参数，可以为解释能量、水蒸气和碳交换观测提供更全面的背景。这些额外的数据集有助于理解不同环境变量之间的相互作用，并可以导致对生态系统过程及其对环境变化响应的更准确洞察。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the potential impact on ecological stability and socio-economic development if long-term observational datasets are used to recognize oasis-desert interactions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 如果长期观测数据集用于识别绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用，可能对生态稳定性和社会经济发展产生的潜在影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Long-term observational datasets can significantly enhance the understanding of oasis-desert interactions, which is crucial for maintaining ecological stability. This can lead to informed decision-making that supports sustainable development, helps achieve carbon peaking and neutrality goals, and ensures the ecological security of oasis regions, thus positively impacting both the environment and socio-economic development.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 长期的观察性数据集可以显著增强对绿洲-沙漠相互作用的理解，这对维持生态稳定至关重要。这可以促进基于信息的决策，支持可持续发展，帮助实现碳达峰和碳中和目标，并确保绿洲地区的生态安全，从而对环境和社会经济发展产生积极影响。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems when collecting data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在收集干旱地区能源、水汽和碳交换数据时，保持绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡是重要的原因是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems is crucial to achieving sustainable oasis development, supporting ecological security, and promoting socioeconomic development. Understanding the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in these ecosystems is key to achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals and recognizing the interactions that stabilize ecological and agricultural productivity in arid regions.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续的绿洲发展、支持生态安全以及促进社会经济发展至关重要。理解这些生态系统中的能量、水汽和碳交换是实现碳达峰和碳中和目标的关键，同时也有助于认识到在干旱地区稳定生态和农业生产力的相互作用。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it critical to address the ecological environment degradation in inland river basins when studying oasis–desert ecosystems?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在研究绿洲-沙漠生态系统时，解决内陆河流流域的生态环境退化问题至关重要。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Addressing ecological environment degradation in inland river basins is critical because these areas are facing crises such as drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of vegetation, intensification of desertification, and frequent dust storms. These issues threaten the ecological stability and sustainability of oasis–desert ecosystems, particularly in regions like the Tarim River basin and others along the Silk Road.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 解决内陆河流流域的生态环境退化问题至关重要，因为这些地区正面临着河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化、沙漠化加剧以及频繁的沙尘暴等危机。这些问题威胁着绿洲-沙漠生态系统的生态稳定性和可持续性，特别是在塔里木河流域以及丝绸之路沿线的其他地区。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the key data processing steps involved in converting raw data from an eddy covariance system into usable flux measurements for desert ecosystems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 将涡度协方差系统的原始数据转换为沙漠生态系统可用的通量测量涉及的关键数据处理步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The key data processing steps include outlier removal, delay time correction, coordinate rotation (double rotation), frequency response correction, sonic virtual temperature correction, and density correction (WPL correction). Additionally, flux values undergo quality assessment based on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity characteristics. Data from periods with instrument errors, rain events, or when more than 10% of original data within 30 minutes is missing, are excluded.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 关键的数据处理步骤包括异常值去除、延迟时间修正、坐标旋转（双旋转）、频率响应修正、声学虚温修正和密度修正（WPL修正）。此外，通量值根据大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征进行质量评估。对于仪器错误、降雨事件或在30分钟内超过10%的原始数据缺失的时间段，数据将被排除。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How are different types of hydrometeorological data integrated and utilized to support the analysis of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in arid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 不同类型的水文气象数据是如何整合和利用的，以支持对干旱地区能量、水汽和碳交换的分析？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Hydrometeorological data, including radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, gradients of air temperature and humidity, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles, are collected using automatic weather stations with a 10-minute average period. These data, along with groundwater table information, are integrated to provide a comprehensive understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange processes in oasis-desert systems.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 水文气象数据，包括辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水量以及土壤湿度剖面，使用自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期进行收集。这些数据与地下水位信息相结合，以提供对绿洲-沙漠系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换过程的全面理解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are employed to ensure the quality and reliability of long-term observational datasets involving energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes in arid and semi-arid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保涉及干旱和半干旱地区的能量、水蒸气和碳通量的长期观测数据集的质量和可靠性，采用了哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Quality and reliability of datasets are ensured through a comprehensive data processing and quality control procedure, which includes data collection, processing, and archiving. The datasets undergo rigorous quality checks, such as removing data with known instrument errors, excluding data around precipitation events, and ensuring no more than 10% of data is missing in any 30-minute period. Additionally, the data are reviewed for consistency and accuracy before being archived and shared.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 数据集的质量和可靠性通过全面的数据处理和质量控制程序得以确保，包括数据收集、处理和归档。数据集经过严格的质量检查，例如去除已知仪器错误的数据、排除降水事件周围的数据，并确保在任何30分钟的时间段内缺失数据不超过10%。此外，数据在归档和共享之前会进行一致性和准确性的审查。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What observational technologies and methodologies enable the collection of comprehensive data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些观测技术和方法能够在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集关于能量、水蒸气和碳交换的综合数据？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The collection of comprehensive data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is enabled by the use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers for half-hourly turbulent flux data, as well as automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data with a 10-minute average period. These technologies facilitate the observation of radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, gradients of air temperature and humidity, wind speed and direction, air pressure, precipitation, soil moisture profiles, and groundwater table data.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，利用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪收集能量、水汽和碳交换的综合数据，这些设备提供半小时的湍流通量数据，同时自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期收集水文气象数据。这些技术能够观察辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压、降水、土壤湿度剖面以及地下水位数据。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What infrastructural or environmental conditions are necessary to maintain long-term observational datasets in the context of oasis–desert systems within arid regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠系统中，维持长期观测数据集所需的基础设施或环境条件是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Maintaining long-term observational datasets in oasis–desert systems within arid regions requires establishing a network of land surface flux and meteorological stations with consistent data collection capabilities. This involves geographical positioning in key locations such as the middle and lower reaches of river basins, ensuring access to water from cryospheric sources, and providing continuous data collection on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, supplemented by vegetation and soil parameters.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠系统中，维护长期观测数据集需要建立一个具有一致数据收集能力的地表通量和气象站网络。这涉及在关键位置进行地理定位，例如河流流域的中下游，确保能够获取来自冰冻圈的水源，并提供关于能量、水蒸气和碳交换的连续数据收集，同时补充植被和土壤参数。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be a need to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems when collecting data on energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在收集关于能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据时，维护绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡可能是必要的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: It is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems to achieve sustainable oasis development and to support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange is crucial for achieving the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in oasis–desert areas.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续的绿洲发展以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展至关重要。了解能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区碳达峰和碳中和的目标至关重要。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is long-term observation data considered indispensable for understanding oasis–desert interactions?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 长期观测数据被认为是理解绿洲与沙漠相互作用不可或缺的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Long-term observations are indispensable for obtaining a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas. This understanding is significant for recognizing the interactions between oases and deserts and protecting the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 长期观测对于获得绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解至关重要。这种理解对于认识绿洲与沙漠之间的相互作用以及保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the considerations for ensuring the quality and reliability of data collected using eddy covariance systems in arid and semiarid regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区使用涡度协方差系统收集数据时，确保数据质量和可靠性的考虑因素有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The quality and reliability of data collected using eddy covariance systems in arid and semiarid regions can be ensured by implementing rigorous data processing steps such as despiking, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, and density correction. Additionally, quality assessment of flux values is essential, focusing on atmospheric stability and turbulent similarity characteristics. Data should also be screened for instrument errors, precipitation events, and significant data gaps, as described in the field's methodologies.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，使用涡度协方差系统收集的数据的质量和可靠性可以通过实施严格的数据处理步骤来确保，例如去尖峰、时间延迟修正、坐标旋转、频率响应修正和密度修正。此外，流量值的质量评估至关重要，重点关注大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征。数据还应筛选仪器错误、降水事件和显著的数据缺口，正如该领域的方法论所描述的。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What challenges might researchers face when collecting data in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas, and how can these be mitigated?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 研究人员在干旱和半干旱地区的内陆河流流域收集数据时可能面临哪些挑战，以及如何减轻这些挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Researchers might face challenges such as ecological environment degradation, river and lake drying, vegetation degradation, land desertification, and frequent dust storms in inland river basins of arid and semiarid areas. These can be mitigated by employing robust and resilient data collection equipment, ensuring regular maintenance and calibration of instruments, and incorporating remote sensing data to complement ground-based observations.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 研究人员可能面临的挑战包括生态环境退化、河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化、土地沙漠化以及内陆河流流域干旱和半干旱地区频繁的沙尘暴。这些问题可以通过采用稳健且具有韧性的数据收集设备、确保仪器的定期维护和校准，以及结合遥感数据来补充地面观测来缓解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how eddy covariance systems are able to measure turbulence-related data so precisely in arid environments.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白涡度协方差系统是如何在干旱环境中如此精确地测量与湍流相关的数据的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Eddy covariance systems, like the one mentioned, utilize high-frequency data collection (e.g., 10Hz) to capture fluctuations in wind speed, temperature, and gas concentrations, which are then aggregated into averages over set intervals, such as 30 minutes. This method allows for precise calculations of turbulent fluxes even in challenging environments like arid regions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差系统，如所提到的，利用高频数据采集（例如10Hz）来捕捉风速、温度和气体浓度的波动，然后将其汇总为设定时间间隔（如30分钟）的平均值。这种方法即使在干旱地区等挑战性环境中，也能精确计算湍流通量。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how data from disparate sources in oasis-desert systems can be integrated to study energy and carbon exchange.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解如何将来自不同来源的数据整合在一起，以研究绿洲-沙漠系统中的能量和碳交换。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Data integration in oasis-desert systems involves combining flux measurements from eddy covariance systems with auxiliary hydrometeorological data, soil and vegetation parameters, and additional environmental data. This integrated approach provides a comprehensive view of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange, supporting the understanding of complex interactions within these ecosystems.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，数据集成涉及将涡度协方差系统的通量测量与辅助的水文气象数据、土壤和植被参数以及其他环境数据相结合。这种综合方法提供了能量、水蒸气和碳交换的全面视角，支持对这些生态系统内复杂相互作用的理解。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the challenges faced in maintaining data quality and coverage in oasis–desert ecosystems over long-term observational periods.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在长期观察期间维护绿洲-沙漠生态系统的数据质量和覆盖面所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include ecological environment degradation, such as drying rivers and lakes, natural vegetation degradation, land desertification, and frequent dust storms. Data quality maintenance involves filtering out data during instrument errors, precipitation events, and when data loss exceeds 10% in a 30-minute period.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括生态环境退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化以及频繁的沙尘暴。数据质量维护涉及在仪器错误、降水事件以及在30分钟内数据丢失超过10%时过滤掉数据。
